mdRecord.dcterms:title: Subdivision of "Oak Hill" estate of Jed. Hotchkiss and B. Sears in Staunton, Va / Engineer Office of Jed. Hotchkiss, Staunton, Va., Jan. 4, 1878. Map of a portion of Staunton, Va., showing location of "Oak Hill" lots
Commissioners sale of thirty valuable building lots on Oak Hill in Staunton Virginia adjacent to the depot and shops of the Chesapeake Ohio R R
Map no 1 Subdivision of Oak Hill estate of Jed Hotchkiss and B Sears in Staunton Va
Map of a portion of Staunton Va showing location of Oak Hill lots
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sheet also contains text of sale information.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; not in Swem, E.G. Maps relating to Virginia; copy 1 torn into 2 pieces and has names written in pencil on some lots and red X's on some lots; on back of copy 1: 4 Sears Hill, lots 63, 64, 66, 58 - map - Chas. Rointy(?).
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; copy 2 only top portion of sheet, also torn into 2 pieces.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Real property--Virginia--Staunton--Maps
